Author: biochembiscuit
Text: i understand this pain so, so hard... please remember that tomorrow is a new day with new opportunities, and that relapsing is part of recovery. you have nothing to be ashamed of. you are worthy of recovery from this illness, and you are worthy of the food you eat. it may not feel significant to you right now, but three days of establishing healthy habits is something to be proud of. you can do this. please message me any time if you need a friend.
